CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 3, 1946 reads: "A Feature Attraction - A star of the gigantic Water Circus, which will be staged at Ammon Recreation Center swimming pool on Bedford Avenue on the evening of Friday, Aug. 9, is winsome Mrs. Jean McCoy Curtis, one of the Smoky City's most agile mermaids. Mrs. Curtis is rated among top women swimmers throughout the country and will be featured in a number of sensational performances.  The Circus is but one of the many activities of Frogs Week. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Jean McCoy Curtis, wearing one piece bathing suit with floral front and dark back, posed on ladder of Ammon recreation center swimming pool
